title: WRITE-IN
subtitle: We'd Love To Hear From You

questions.question: Does your community have an annual festival?
questions.details: From parades to harvest jubilees; we want to know what's going on.

questions.question: Is there a smoker who's making a difference in your community?
questions.details: Whether it's helping the homeless or restoring local landmarks, tell how he or she is a benefit to your area.

incentive.description: If we feature your Write-In, Doral will donate $500 to that charity.
incentive.additional: A free carton for your DORAL thoughts. If we print a story or photo you send in, you'll get a free carton in return!

contact.address: Send to: Doral, P.O. Box 308, Louisville, KY 40232-0308
